short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your Amazon Affiliate Link directly from the Amazon prdouct page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin places an Amazon Affiliate Link button on your Amazon.com product page. It enables you to get your Amazon Associate Affiliate Link directly from the Amazon product page without having to login to your Associates back office.
